metadata.name: Radio Atılım Statistics Monitor
metadata.desc: A utility developed for RADIO ATILIM to show streaming statistics.

info.content: Radio Atılım Statistics Monitor is a utility developed for RADIO ATILIM to show streaming statistics.

info.title: Features
items: Sleek Neumorphic GUI providing a professional look and feel
Statistics updated real-time and recorded on timelines (Max. 120 records per timeline)
A timeline manager which lists each timeline chronologically and allows you to preview them
Double-click on the title of the songs and listen them on Radio Atılım's Website

info.name: photo.png
info.alt: GUI of Radio Atılım Statistics Monitor.
